application.model

Class SpriteModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.SpriteModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmmoModel, CityModel, PlayerGunModel, PlayerProjectileModel, ProjectileModel

    public abstract class SpriteModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic sprite model implementing motion, rendering, and boundary checking.
    Author:
    Michael Cavazos
